nodes.text: D-0T was a blue-plated protocol droid who worked for the Galactic Senate during the Clone Wars.

During the Senate hostage crisis in  22 BBY, this droid was working in the Republic Executive Building in the power control room when Cad Bane's posse entered the room. It was destroyed by HELIOS-3E, one of Bane's IG-86 sentinel droids.

D-0T's character model appears to have been reused for Dantum Roohd's protocol droid in the Clone Wars episode "Duchess of Mandalore". The droid was present with Dantum when Supreme Chancellor Palpatine was addressing whether to send clone troopers to Mandalore or not.
